questions.quote: Of course it's a good idea, it's my idea. I conceived this whole project two years ago.
Hey, I've been trying to jam stuff in the box, like you told me, but sometimes it says, like, "Photographs - Do not bend".
Jake, Jake. Take a look.  Aaw, see, you're not the only one who has 'em. I have them too.
You know, when I first met you, Kramer, you used to wear jeans all the time.
They're good around the house -- and they're good for outside.
Oh great, put it all on the Peterman account with the other stuff.
Oh, no. No. We're good. Let's get goin'. Alright.  Watch it, funny man.
You'd really like him, you know, I can't wait to get on that boat.
Your father won a thousand dollars at the track last week, and he gave you a hundred, and you were supposed to give fifty dollars to your sister.
You could read the paper through the whole thing if you want.
